name: x402-routenet
description: Smart routing infrastructure for x402 services. Route any capability request to the best available x402 service — automatically selected by price, speed, or quality. Built on x402 Service Discovery.

tools.name: routenet_route
tools.description: Route a capability request to the best available x402 service. Returns routing decision, cost breakdown (Pricing Model 3: $0.0002 flat + 0.5% settlement), and quality signals.

tools.name: routenet_simulate
tools.description: Dry-run routing decision. Preview which x402 service would be selected and why, with top-5 candidates ranked. Free, no execution.

tools.name: routenet_strategies
tools.description: List all routing strategies (best, cheapest, fastest, custom) with scoring formulas, use cases, and Pricing Model 3 fee structure.

prompts.name: route_capability_request
prompts.description: Guided workflow: describe what capability you need, RouteNet finds the best x402 service.

prompts.name: compare_routing_strategies
prompts.description: Compare best vs cheapest vs fastest routing strategies for any capability.

resources.name: Routing Strategies
resources.description: All routing strategies with formulas and use cases

resources.name: Pricing Model 3
resources.description: Fee structure: $0.0002 flat routing fee + 0.5% settlement

discoveryApiUrl.description: x402 Service Discovery API URL (optional override)
